attributes.additional_details:
HELP SAVE THE COKE CAN..STOP Them Making A Skate Park If They DO There Will Be NO Coke Can!!



 SAVE THE COKE CAN,....... the council wana put a skate park there instead.. dont they realise they are destroying a buisness a family have built up and that all wil be out of work...

 if this skate park goes ahead then that means we will NO longer be by sandy water park!! There will be no more coke can at sandy!!!

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and therefore not something that the UK Government would get involved in.
